name: Sentenced to Death
description:
You are an escapee who is trying to out-run the cops. Along the way, you help other escapees who were stranded due to the cops' heavy fire. Your task is to open all the beacons in the local sector and warp out of there.

This was supposed to be a submission for Brackey's Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Stronger Together" but due to mismanagement, it didn't make it.
